Uses of Class
com.microsoft.azure.servicebus.security.TokenProvider

  • Packages that use TokenProvider 
    Package Description
    com.microsoft.azure.servicebus  
    com.microsoft.azure.servicebus.security  

    • Uses of TokenProvider in com.microsoft.azure.servicebus

      Methods in com.microsoft.azure.servicebus that return TokenProvider 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      TokenProvider ClientSettings.getTokenProvider​()
      Gets the token provider contained in this instance.
      Constructors in com.microsoft.azure.servicebus with parameters of type TokenProvider 
      Constructor Description
      ClientSettings​(TokenProvider tokenProvider)
      Creates a new instance with the given token provider, default retry policy and default operation timeout.
      ClientSettings​(TokenProvider tokenProvider, RetryPolicy retryPolicy, java.time.Duration operationTimeout)
      Creates a new instance with the given token provider, retry policy and operation timeout.

    • Uses of TokenProvider in com.microsoft.azure.servicebus.security

      Subclasses of TokenProvider in com.microsoft.azure.servicebus.security 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AzureActiveDirectoryTokenProvider
      This is a token provider that obtains tokens from Azure Active Directory.
      class  ManagedServiceIdentityTokenProvider
      This is a token provider that obtains token using Managed Service Identity(MSI).
      class  SharedAccessSignatureTokenProvider
      This is a token provider that generates Shared Access Signature(SAS) tokens or reuses an already generated SAS token.
      Methods in com.microsoft.azure.servicebus.security that return TokenProvider 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static TokenProvider TokenProvider.createAzureActiveDirectoryTokenProvider​(java.lang.String authorityUrl, java.lang.String clientId, java.lang.String clientSecret)
      Creates an Azure Active Directory token provider that acquires a token from the given active directory instance using the given clientId and client secret.
      static TokenProvider TokenProvider.createAzureActiveDirectoryTokenProvider​(java.lang.String authorityUrl, java.lang.String clientId, java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password)
      Creates an Azure Active Directory token provider that acquires a token from the given active directory instance using the given clientId, username and password.
      static TokenProvider TokenProvider.createManagedServiceIdentityTokenProvider​()
      Creates a Managed Service Identity token provider.
      static TokenProvider TokenProvider.createSharedAccessSignatureTokenProvider​(java.lang.String sasKeyName, java.lang.String sasKey)
      Creates a Shared Access Signature token provider with the given key name and key value.
      static TokenProvider TokenProvider.createSharedAccessSignatureTokenProvider​(java.lang.String sasToken, java.time.Instant sasTokenValidUntil)
      Creates a Shared Access Signature token provider that always returns an already created token.
